arts.ttl: Montpellier scores late winner against Toulouse and moves off the bottom of French league
arts.sum: Striker Othmane Maamma came off the bench to score the decisive goal as Montpellier won 2-1 at Toulouse to move off the bottom of the French league on Sunday. On a low-scoring day, striker Mostafa Mohamed grabbed a last-minute goal for Nantes in a 1-1 home draw with Lyon.

arts.ttl: Montpellier pushing Téji Savanier to leave in January
arts.sum: According to Foot Mercato, Montpellier are pushing Téji Savanier (33) to leave the Ligue 1 club during the winter transfer window. The Montpellier-born midfielder is not against the possibility of a…

arts.ttl: Preview: Toulouse vs. Montpellier HSC - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Ligue 1 clash between Toulouse and Montpellier HSC, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Montpellier interested in Andy Delort return
arts.sum: Montpellier manager Jean-Louis Gasset today revealed in his pre-match press conference that MHSC are looking to sign former striker Andy Delort (33), who currently plays for Algerian side Mouloudia Club…
